select T1.MCHNT_NO as "mchntNo", T1.MENO as "meno", T1.CREATE_USER as "createUser", T1.CREATE_TIME as "createTime", T1.MODIFY_USER as "modifyUser", T1.MODIFY_TIME as "modifyTime", decode(T1.DATA_STATE,'1','有效','0','无效') as "dataState" from TB_BLACKLIST_MCHNT T1 where T1.DATA_STATE='1'
T1.MCHNT_NO=#mchntNo:VARCHAR#
T1.MENO like '%'||#meno:VARCHAR#||'%'
T1.CREATE_USER like '%'||#createUser:VARCHAR#||'%'
to_date(subStr(T1.CREATE_TIME,1,8), 'yyyy-MM-dd')>=to_date(to_char(#startDate:DATE#,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'yyyy-MM-dd')
to_date(subStr(T1.CREATE_TIME,1,8), 'yyyy-MM-dd')<=to_date(to_char(#endDate:DATE#,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'yyyy-MM-dd')
T1.MODIFY_USER like '%'||#modifyUser:VARCHAR#||'%'
T1.MODIFY_TIME = #shopCity:CHAR#
T1.DATA_STATE = #dataState:CHAR#
sqlMap.update: update TB_BLACKLIST_MCHNT set DATA_STATE = '0' where MCHNT_NO = #mchntNo:VARCHAR#
